_sText:
Zalos' CTF map pack!

by ZaLoS 

(http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/88918)


Included is all you need to get started on your very own capture the flag map. 

Included:

CT flag (grouped)
T flag (grouped)
Zone triggers for flag capture (Each grouped for the team)
Logic for keeping score and sounds (grouped)
Custom Textures by IceCreamLock and ZaLoS

Not included:
Scoreboard
Means to stop players from picking up their own flag.

I thought making a scoreboard would be pointless because more than likely it will be not be used. As in 

youll prolly want to use a custom scoreboard that fits your map.
Stoping players from picking up their own flag can be done several ways. I did it by placeing a teleport 
around the flags that only teleports that team. Very simple to do if you use a filter. (Team filters are 
included)


How it works:

To pick up a flag you must drop your pistol and pick up the pistol the flag is attached to. Then carry the 

flag to the drop zone for your team and drop your pistol, this will trigger the capture. This pack also 

disables flag capture if your teams flag has been taken. 


You may use this as long as you remember to put me in the credits/authors for you map! 

Installation:

BEFORE YOU OPEN THE VMF. Move the icecreamlock folder to your materials directory located under cstrike/materials. After that everything else should fall into place. 


UPDATE!

V2:

Ive optimized the logic a little bit. The flag should reset a lot better now when someone drops it or someone walks over the flag but doesnt pick it up.




Credits:
Thanks to IceCreamLock for the red and blue textures!
